text: Galactosemia is a rare disease that makes your body unable to convert galactose into glucose. Image:Lactose Haworth.svg|Lactose File:Beta-D- Glucopyranose.svg|Glucose File:Beta-D-Galactopyranose.svg|Galactose == Causes == This is caused in an autosomal recessive pattern, which means both copies of the gene in each cell have mutations. == Related pages == * Lactose * Monosaccharide * Galactose * Glucose == References == Category:Genetic disorders Category:Metabolism
title: Galactosemia
